subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etym}}
{{Han compound|手|alt1=扌|t1=hand|非|ls=psc|c1=s|c2=p}} – to place in line.

subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# to [[put]] in [[order]]
# to [[rehearse]]
# [[row]]; [[rank]]; [[line]]
# [[raft]]
# {{lb|zh|military}} [[platoon]]
# {{zh-short|排球|[[volleyball]]}}
# to [[eject]]; to [[emit]]; to [[excrete]]

subSections.title: Usage notes
subSections.text: * {{sense|military}} Under the {{w|National Revolutionary Army}}, a platoon was composed of three [[squad]]s ({{zh-l|*班}}). In turn, three platoons formed a [[company]] ({{zh-l|*連}}).
